title: Cases list within suite detail
description: Display the list of test cases within a suite. Each case should be expandable to show full configuration. Include actions to add, edit, and delete cases.
acceptance_criteria: Table showing all cases in suite
Expandable rows showing full case config
Expanded view shows: input, expected_tools, expected_output_contains, etc.
implementation_notes: Cases come from suite.cases (nested in suite response)
Use accordion or expandable row pattern
Input field may be large - consider JSON viewer component
Tags should be displayed as pills/badges
